title: Can the Marvel universe defeat the DC universe? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well….NO. DC characters are really strong but some are confusing like lobo, cyborg Superman, and mongul. They show amazing feats of strength but when faced against a weaker character, they loose. For example, cyborg Superman beat 4 supermen (2 who are stronger than the original man of steel)  And yet still lost to the man of steel even with the help of mongul. He even lost against green lantern, who can be literally flicked by anyone.  DC comics characters aren’t stronger than marvels. Marvel has more all-father type figures. DC’s all-fathers consist of very few new gods and 31st century heroes. Also some other heroes of the future like Wonder Woman of the year 85,271 (if she was a threat to big barda, then she is all-father level). But that’s in the future. The strongest characters in the current timeline of DC are the spiritual characters, the supermen, and Batman. But Superman’s strongest punch feat isn’t enough either. He punched a planet using speed blitz and it exploded. The explosion made Superman faint.  But don’t let dc fool you cuz marvel characters destroyed planets even before Superman did WITHOUT FAINTING!!!  Gladiator one punches a planet..,.  Hulk via rocket boosters (no world breaker).  Thor with Mjolnir and Beta Ray Bill in his way…. U see so marvel characters are OP. Some people (such as me) misunderstand that DC doesn’t overpower their characters!!! They make them seem overpowered by giving them almost every superpower. Cosmic Superman has super strength, super speed, super senses, laser eyes, freezing breath, cosmic manipulation, cosmic blasts, and reality warping. Almost every single power but yet Dr. Strange, Dormammu, or galactus have a chance of beating him. Marvel makes their characters with one or 2 specific powers so they can make more characters. Even though they have less powers than that of DC, they are stronger. Didn’t you guys realize that there are almost 45 known characters in DC comics who have the same powers and history of Superman. There are 6 million that are unknown (survivors of kandor). And almost every single character has super speed. That’s what marvel doesn’t want although they failed since they made some copies of hulk, but they didn’t fail at the same time, giving each hulk a specific power or history. Marvel has more variety which makes marvel have more characters. Marvel copied DC’s heroes with less powers but with the weakness or something that could stop their DC counterpart. Like Wade and Slade.  Deadpool is weaker than his counterpart but u know why Slade cant stop him??? Because of his healing factor. It would be a long battle, but Deadpool would find an open spot and stab Slade. In fact Deathstroke was made before Deadpool. Also with Super Skrull and Martian Manhunter.  Super Skrull can beat MMH not because of his phobia of fire (because he got rid of the phobia 10 years ago), but because if a Martian from mars would get blasted by SS scorching hot fire, they would die. If a Martian were to live in Mars it would be accustomed to living in temperatures from -195 degrees F to 70 degrees F. 70 degrees for them would be 130 for us. So they wouldn’t be used to fire. Fire would give them 4th degree burns which is impossible. Ontop of that Kl’rt can block J’onzz telekinesis with invisible woman’s powers and possibly turn MM’s brain into stew by creating a force field inside. Some of you might say that the force field won’t work, but look what sue did to she hulk….  So Kl’rt would beat J’onzz. Some people don’t know if The sentry can defeat Superman (I think it’s stalemate) but that’s why marvel created the void. Void is a team buster. Void is capable of stalematimg or beating MMH who can beat Superman. Ok you might say Spectre, or Anti-monitor are strong. Let’s use COIE anti monitor. Hmmm let’s see. Dark celestial galactus can beat or stalemate him. It is said he destroyed numerous universes just like AM. SCW AM is just trash so he dies to reg galactus. And don’t underestimate galactus. Other versions of galactus can beat anti-monitor. He barely flicked Odin and thanos!!! (Unless you count his helmet being ruined).    Spectre would loose to the 2nd strongest being in the marvel universe (living tribunal). For gods sake he was controlled by a black lantern ring!!! Proof he ain’t all that. Doomsday would loose to space punisher hulk, Destroyer, Mangog, Zom, Surtur, etc. I know I know don’t put in the comments “doomsday comes back to life stronger than he was before” and blah blah blah. I know that already. I’m talking about their first battle in this case not second although mangog could beat doomsday in their second battle since he feeds and gains more power off of anger and hate…..so marvel wins.

I never really liked this question even when I was younger because it really comes down to a popularity contest and who has the better plot armor. DC vs Marvel was a prime example of this. Fans were told of this and allowed to vote for who would win. This meant that the most illogical things could happen. CBR did an article on this. Victories like Aquaman dropping a killer whale on Namor and winning is beyond ridiculous when he has beaten people like the Hulk and only lost his head (RIP Namor) to Hyperion who some consider to be Marvel's Superman. Wolverine beating Lobo when Love has beaten gods and devils. Not a chance. So much bad writing for the fans sake. The pairing up was equally bad. Sure Flash and Quicksilver sounds like a no brainer at first but there is an obvious there. They should have had Batman vs Wolverine. The reality is to look at the numbers. DC has been around longer. They simply have greater numbers. It might come down to some major players like Spectre vs Eternity but, DC has more characters at a ratio of almost 6:1. That's not a fight. That's a beat down.

In this answer I will not include the regular Superheroes. I will use the cosmic Forces of DC and Marvel. This will not be a biased answer, it will be the truth. This will take place in a spaceless and timeless realm away from both universes. The Brothers and The Overvoid will not be involved. Starting in the Blue Corner (DC) Cosmic Armor Superman  Alpheus The World Forger and Perpetua (Full Power)   Lucifer Mornigstar  Michael Demiurgos  The Anti Monitor  The Monitor  The Monitors  The Endless  Dr. Manhattan  Mr. Mxyzptlk  True Darkseid  Nekron  The Spectre and The Phantom Stranger  In the red corner (MARVEL) Astral Regulator Thanos  Pre-Retcon Beyonder and Molecule Man  The One Below All  The Beyonders  The First Firmament  The Living Tribunal  Oblivion  protege  Eternity (Multiverse)  Amatsu Mikobashi  Life Bringer Galactus  Franklin Richards (Adult)  White Phoenix of the crown  The Marquis of Death  Knull  Now Each of these characters will go against each other. Here is the list Cosmic Armor Superman vs Astral Regulator Thanos: Winner- MARVEL Alpheus the World Forger and Perpetua vs Living Tribunal and Oblivion: Winner- tie Michael Demiurgos and Lucifer vs Pre Retcon Beyonder and Pre Retcon Molecule man Winner: MARVEL The Anti Monitor and The Monitor vs Amatsu Mikaboshi and Life Bringer Galactus: Winner-tie The Monitors vs The Beyonders Winner: DC Mr. Myxlplyx vs The Marquis of Death and First Firmament Winner: DC True Darkseid vs The One below all: Winner- MARVEL Spectre and Phantom Stranger vs Franklin Richards and multi eternity: Winner- MARVEL Dr. Manhattan and the Endless vs White Phoenix and Protege: Winner- DC Nekron vs Knull: Winner- DC so… THE WINNER IS…..NO ONE. They all destroy each other when they fight but if all of MARVEL and DC were to fight MARVEL would win It may sound confusing but Marvel wins becuase they have more reality warpers and they also have the Queen of Nevers who is all possibilities made into one being. She could easily write a future were Marvel wins.

Whomever the writer decides. Honestly, someone who gets into “whats better/more powerful” arguments between the two biggest comics companies either doesnt read comics and as asking from ignorance, or has issues. True fans of comic books enjoy both, depending on who’s writing and drawing, what the story is and the habits of the EIC’s for both. Or are we talking about sales and popularity? If so, its still a tossup. DC often has better rated comics than Marvel (story and/or art), though Marvel has pulled off some major winners. Over the last two decades in terms of sales Marvel has topped DC…in the last decade they have dominated DC for share. Both publishers have their strong points and issues, and both have something to offer to readers. After 50 years of reading comics, wanna know who my favorite is? Easy answer: sometimes its Marvel, other times its DC, sometimes its even Vertigo or Image or Dark Horse. You are actually allowed to like both corn and flour tortillas. If you absolutely love the programming on FX its still OK to watch AMC. It doesnt have to be a pissing contest.

This isn’t even close. I’m a massive fanboy of both, but DC stomps. Hear let me tell you why. Marvel has characters such as The One-Above-All, Fulcrum, Beyonder, Living Tribunal, Cosmic Immortal Hulk, The One Below All, Thanos (HOTU, God Quarry, or Regulator). But DC has even more characters that powerful. They have characters more powerful than most of the ones I just name. A few of them are Lucifer Morningstar, Gabriel Hornblower, Michael Demiurgos, Great Evil Beast, Elaine Belloc, and The Presence. In this battle, characters like Thor, Superman, Sentry, and Shazam don’t matter. But characters that are incredibly powerful do matter.

Ezra Eastling's answer to Can the Marvel universe defeat the DC universe? DC has three stand-ins for God: Elaine Belloc  The Presence  And The Great Evil Beast(Dark version of The Presence)  to Marvels 1 and a half: The One Above All. Possibly Stan Lee.  And the Fulcrum. Possibly Jack Kirby(Some say TOAAs equal, some say just an aspect of him).  Ezra Eastling's answer to Who are the 10 most powerful comic characters across both comic franchise's universes (DC and Marvel)?DC has MANY more Superman allegories/clones, and their cosmic landscape, while not as thorough, is MUCH more powerful. With the likes of Lucifer Morningstar,  Ezra Eastling's answer to Who would win, The One Below All (Marvel) vs Lucifer Morningstar (DC)?Michael Demiurgos,  and Dr. Manhattan,  a Metaversal Reality Warper, all of which have no equals and are the three most powerful nigh-omnipotent beings across both publications. DC. By a wide margin.

Stronger in what sense? Both “universes” contain fantastic beings whose power varies usually based on what the writer has in mind. As far as the heroes go, lots of variations. Are we talking the Superman who can move planets or the Superman who can simply shatter mountains?  The Hulk whose strength is theoretically limitless, but who can still be stunned by say the Abomination?  Not to mention all the Superman dopplegangers Marvel has created over time including Blue Marvel and Sentry. The aliens with powers all vary too. We have the Spectre, Krona, Anti-Monitor, Doctor Manhattan etc with DC. With Marvel we have Eternity, Galactus, the Beyonder, Thanos, the Celestials etc. Thus, the answer is it’s subjective and based on the whim of writers!

Depends on what you mean. In general, the DC characters are stronger then the Marvel characters, debatable by anyone with a well structured argument, but I think the feats of some DC heroes (and villains for that matter) speak for themselves. Is DC stronger then the entire Marvel universe? No, both have supreme gods that represent the writers/companies and are omnipotent, omniscient and omnipresent, quite unbeatable in the sense that the writers of the respective universe would have it no other way. If you mean which universe is “better” then I don’t have an answer for you, that matter is purely opinion based, and can’t really have a definitive answer.

The marvel universe has way too many celestials that are alot stronger than dc. Dc's most powerful character is the pressence, who is nowhere near as strong as the one above all, the beyonder is likely alot more powerful as well. Marvel just has Way more op superhero than dc, there are so many omnipotent celestials that just cant be beaten. Marvel has tons of gods and superheroes that can even be killed. Dc creates most characters with a weakness while marvel doesn't care as much.

By what terms? The comics or the movies? The MCU is obviously more successful than Warner’s DC universe. Sony’s Marvel movies seem to be doing well too now, but Sony didn't properly start it's own MCU yet like Disney did. We known that DC, despite some of the good movies that came out, some of them are bad and destroyed the DCEU. As for the comics themselves, that's a decades old feud I'm not savvy enough for.

…the litertal Universe, no, Marvel's universe would kick DC's universe arse pretty easily as DCs universe appears to be a wall while Marvel's appears as a being of immense strength. I think we can all picture what happens to a wall in super hero comics. Individual main characters though, far out power Marvel's main characters.

Depends on what you mean by “winning”. if you’re talking about comic books sales, Marvel comics sells more now becasue of the MCU popularity. if you mean the characters actually fighting.. that’s REAAALLY difficult to say. probably the DC characters. the reason why DC characters are stronger is the same reason why they’re more boring, a lot of them are overpowered compared to the Marvel ones that are intentionally VERY flawed

There are alot of major powerhouses in both universes. So if there was an all out battle between the DC and Marvel universe, they most likely would destroy each other, and then Doctor Strangefate, from the Amalgam Universe, would restart both universes, as if it never happened.

This is a weird question. Strong in power? Strong in terms of quality? Both are debatable. Marvel pumps out a new reality warper every week it seems lol, and they're all stronger than the last. Scarlet Witch wiped out a population with words, Franklin made a universe, Marquis is just fucking insane I won't even get into it. In general it really depends on whoever is in charge. Comic book feats contradict each other often so it's all up for grabs. In terms of quality, they both are equal to me

this battle would come to a deadlock between the omnipotent beings from both. unless the one above all didn’t destroy the astral regulators and the heart of the universe. then DC is going to win thanks to that achilles heel that marvel has.

I don't think so. Superman's only weakness is criponite, and red Suns, how will the marvel universe know? The flash is 13 trillion faster than the speed of light, while quick silver is only about 7-8 times the speed of sound.  DC's heroes are over the top while Marvel's city destruction is over the top!
Ofcourse they CAN.Even DC CAN defeat the Marvel Universe.It's all dependent on what the story demands. But assuredly, its completely plausible for one universe to defeat the other.
Yes
Duh marvel we have the avengers and fantastic four and mutants and dont get me started about thanos he would destroy all the dc
In terms of a fight DC all the f*cking way!!!!
Batman period.
